web.title: Eireneh
web.line:
Welcome to Eireneh. Stuff to look at - on this site the only thing of note is Project B.
Project B is a platform for various Bible programs using Java. It will support desktop applications like the On-Line Bible, there is a Web interface, some add-in macros for MS Word. Other interfaces are in development.

There is a little demo applet, that is not very inspiring. The point is to show this stuff running in web browsers as well as web servers.
There is an alternative home page here. It was going to be the normal home page, however it is probably a bit silly to have as an introduction.

Other pages that are of note: A while back I help to get Christadelphian.Org set up. There is a related project called Sword. The idea is the same however this is C++ based and not Java based.
The mailing lists, forums, bug-lists, some downloads, and so on are hosted by SourceForge.
